Prompt.pre_question_prompt: I am a civil engineer specializing in water dam construction. I will ask some questions to collect information, and then I will use the information to create a comprehensive dam design.
Prompt.task_specific_prompt: Write a dam design engineering proposal using the questions and answers above. Note this proposal will be presented to the city officials.

QApair.What is the purpose of the dam?: The dam is being built for agricultural and residential purposes

QApair.What is the height of the dam?: The dam will be 40 meters high.

QApair.What is the length of the dam?: The dam will be 1000 meters long.

QApair.What is the width of the dam?: The dam will be 20 meters wide.

QApair.What is the maximum water level that the: The maximum water level that the dam can hold is 200 meters.

QApair.What is the size of the reservoir that t: The reservoir that the dam will create will be 3000 hectares.

QApair.What is the average rainfall in the area: The average rainfall in the area is 300mm.

QApair.What is the maximum flood level that is: The maximum flood level that is expected in the area is 200mm.

QApair.What is the slope of the land in the are: The slope of the land in the area is 2%.

QApair.What is the width of the river that the: The width of the river that the dam will be built on is 200 meters.

QApair.What is the depth of the river?: The depth of the river is 15 meters.

QApair.What is the average flow velocity of the: The average flow velocity of the river is 1 meter per second.

Instances.Output: The purpose of the dam is to provide water for agricultural and residential purposes. The dam will be 40 meters high and 1000 meters long. It will be 20 meters wide and will have a maximum water level of 200 meters. The reservoir that the dam will create will be 3000 hectares. The average rainfall in the area is 300mm and the maximum flood level that is expected in the area is 200mm. The soil type in the area is clay and the bedrock type is granite. The seismic activity in the area is low and the slope of the land is 2%. The width of the river that the dam will be built on is 200 meters and the depth of the river is 15 meters. The average flow velocity of the river is 1 meter per second.

QApair.What is the purpose of the dam?: The dam is being built for the purpose of creating a reservoir to store water for the town's water supply.

QApair.What is the height of the dam?: The dam will be 100 feet high.

QApair.What is the length of the dam?: The dam will be 700 feet long.

QApair.What is the width of the dam?: The dam will be 200 feet wide.

QApair.What is the depth of the water in the re: The depth of the water in the reservoir will be 90 feet.

QApair.What is the average rainfall in the area: The average rainfall in the area is 50 inches per year.

QApair.What is the maximum flood level in the a: The maximum flood level in the area is 50 feet.

QApair.What is the water temperature in the are: The water temperature is 40 degrees Fahrenheit.

QApair.What is the wind speed in the area?: The wind speed is 35 miles per hour.

QApair.What is the air temperature in the area?: The air temperature is 70 degrees Fahrenheit.

Instances.Output: The proposed dam will be an earth-filled dam with a height of 100 feet, a length of 700 feet, and a width of 200 feet. The reservoir created by the dam will have a depth of 90 feet and will supply the town's water needs. The average rainfall in the area is 50 inches per year, and the maximum flood level is 50 feet. The soil type in the area is sandy, and the bedrock depth is 300 feet. The seismic activity in the area is high, and the groundwater level is 100 feet. The groundwater quality in the area is poor, and the land use is agricultural. The surrounding land uses are residential, and there is no mining activity in the area. The ground slope in the area is 3%, and the foundation material is granite. The water table in the area is 50 feet, and the water quality is ok. The water temperature in the area is 40 degrees Fahrenheit, and the wind speed is 35 miles per hour. The air temperature in the area is 70 degrees Fahrenheit, and the humidity is 70%.

QApair.What are your water usage goals?: Ensure the water supply can handle the growth

QApair.What are your plans for the future of yo: The city is growing at a rapid rate of 5% each year
The water system will need to be expanded to accommodate the growth of the city. Infrastructure for ground water will need to be developed.
The wastewater system will need to be expanded to accommodate the growth of the city.
Existing infrastructure will need to be expanded
The city will need to maintain the current standards and expand the current infrastructure
The irrigation system will be expanded and subsidized by federal grants in order to promote agricultural growth
The industrial water system will be expanded and subsidized by federal grants in order to promote growth
The water recycling system will be expanded in order to save water
The city currently does not have a budget for it
It is not developed and will need to be addressed in the future

Instances.Output: The city plans to grow at a rapid rate of 5% each year. In order to accommodate this growth, the water system will need to be expanded. This expansion will include the development of infrastructure for ground water. The wastewater system will also need to be expanded to accommodate the growth of the city. Existing infrastructure for stormwater will need to be expanded. The city will need to maintain the current standards and expand the current infrastructure for drinking water. The irrigation system will be expanded and subsidized by federal grants in order to promote agricultural growth. The industrial water system will be expanded and subsidized by federal grants in order to promote growth. The water recycling system will be expanded in order to save water. The city currently does not have a budget for desalination. Groundwater will need to be addressed in the future.
